>
[Energy Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2918) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 71 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

[Energy Heart](/Feats.aspx?ID=2888)

</column>

---

Your eidolon has stronger resistance. Its resistance from Energy Heart and [Dual Energy Heart](/Feats.aspx?ID=2902) increase to your level.
name: Energy Resistance
